--- select_alias_without_as.sql
select 1 A

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Results: []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Alias{
        Expr: &ast.IntLiteral{
          ValuePos: 7,
          ValueEnd: 8,
          Base: 10,
          Value: "1",
        },
        As: &ast.AsAlias{
          As: -1,
          Alias: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 9,
            NameEnd: 10,
            Name: "A",
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT 1 A
